data.text: @lee_kovarsky And the mass transfer of wealth from the law enforcement industry that would have resulted from the only available solution until the vaccines:  large-scale decarceration.
And the public accepts it all because of entrenched-but-empirically-unsupported views about prisoner danger, and morally dubious assessments of their worth as human beings. /end
almost certainly because they weren't as easily forgotten as criminals. Senseless bureaucratic vetos were laundered through silly claims about correctional expertise in managing pandemic response. 3/
